New Records: Lahiru Kumara took 3 wickets for 35 runs in the match
Key Match Events: Ben Stokes was dismissed by Lahiru Kumara after a review, a pivotal moment in the match
Pre-Game Insights: England elected to bat first after winning the toss
Post-Match Reflections: Lahiru Kumara was named Player of the Match for his impactful performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru
It was a day-night match with 50 overs per side
Sri Lanka won by 8 wickets with 146 balls remaining
